mean_cn: n. 迁就，奉承，彬彬有礼
mean_en: a disposition or tendency to yield to the will of others
word_etyma: com 共同 + plais 高兴 + ance 表名词，状态、情况、性质、行为 → n. 殷勤；彬彬有礼；柔顺
short_phrase: the complaisance and beauty of a Japanese girl
sentence: Japanese geishas are famous for their beauty and their complaisance.
sentence_trans: 日本艺妓以美貌和殷勤闻名。
